name: One Way Out (PixelAmerica)
description:
A space marine awakes from cryptosleep early while on a journey across the stars to a new, different planet. As soon as the red emergency lights hit him, he realizes he's in trouble. He dons his armor and weapon, and looks around to see all other cryptosleep cells shattered, he is the only survivor. There's movement in the vents below his feet. This is no ordinary emergency.

You are that space marine, and your mission is to find the last escape pod off this ship. If the teeming hordes that have taken over the ship don't rip you to shreds first that is. 

There's only One Way Out.

CONTENT WARNING

Graphic pixel violence ahead

GAMEPLAY WARNING

This game is hard. Be prepared to fail, reset, and try again. There are no checkpoints, but the game is short. Keep your wits about you, space marine.
